content: उपात्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Got, received, acquired, obtained; °विद्यः <ls>R. 5. 1</ls>; जन्मांतर° <ls>K. 96</ls>, <ls n="K.">166</ls>, <ls n="K.">334</ls>, <ls n="K.">346.</ls> {@--2@} Appropriated. {@--3@} Taken away, seized. {@--4@} Felt, perceived, regarded. {@--5@} Employed, used; <ls>Ku. 7. 20.</ls> {@--6@} Comprised. {@--7@} Begun, commenced. {@--8@} Mentioned. {@--9@} Allowed in argument, granted, conceded. --त्तः An elephant out of rut.
